meanings.sent1: Her convincingness in the debate won over many voters.
meanings.sent2: The convincingness of his argument made me change my mind.
meanings.sent3: His convincingness in getting out of doing chores is impressive.
meanings.sent4: The convincingness of the evidence left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent5: The lawyer's convincingness in the courtroom was unmatched.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being persuasive or believable.
meanings.sent1: The convincingness of the sales pitch led to many purchases.
meanings.sent2: His convincingness made it hard to resist his proposal.
meanings.sent3: The convincingness of the excuse made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The convincingness of the story transported me to another world.
meanings.sent5: The convincingness of the actor's performance left the audience in awe.
